This week I introduced The Safe Homefront Act w/@GerryConnolly & @RepPeteKing to help close those loopholes & ensure that convicted abusers within the service branches are incapable of possessing firearms. Bills like this are strong steps forward in preventing future tragedies.
#SutherlandSpringsShooting exposed failures in @DeptofDefense's processes for reporting military convictions to civilian authorities.
